item.title: Dukura
item.description: Overview Dukura is a type of mushroom, a fungus native to the -1st realm. The mushrooms are a valuable food source for the cohabitant species, and are a rare, expensive part of the cuisines of many cultures.

item.title: Shiri
item.description: Overview Shiri is a mushroom native to the wet, forested areas of the 2nd realm. It has a pink colour, and is edible when cooked.
